Content.Text:
<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...What? What do you want from me?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look so excited, for how early it is! How can
you have this much energy?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I haaaaate mooooorniiiiings. Go away. Now's not
a good time. Gotta wait for the rest of my brain
to wake up.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...What? If you have something to tell me,
please make it quick. I haven't got all day!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're always on the move, aren't you? I'm
getting tired just looking at you...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You must be so bored, having come all this way
just to talk to me. I don't have anything
interesting to tell you, I'm afraid!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How's it going? You finished all your work?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I...am...beat! Maybe I should go to sleep early
tonight. And you should, too! Don't stay up too
late or the sandman'll get you, you hear?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Jeez, what brings you here at this hour? ...You
just wanted to say good night?!
<PAGE>
...You are an odd one, I'll give you that!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. You seem awfully busy for this
early hour. Don't overwork yourself, now!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
It's a bit early for a visit, don't you think? ...Can't
fault you on devotion, though, that's for sure!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Eep, don't sneak up on me like that! I was just
thinking about you, and there you were. "Speak
of the devil," and all that...you devil!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Well, I'm certainly awake now! Haha...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, <MYNAME>! You look peppy again today.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, what's wrong? Did you need
something?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You do seem to get around, but I hope you're at
least keeping your distance from anyplace too
dangerous.
<PAGE>
You scare me sometimes!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, were you busy today?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...Oh, no, I'm not trying to say I missed you or
anything!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you finish your work for the day? You
always seem so busy, but don't push yourself
too hard. I swear, all I do is worry about you!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey there! Did you come just to see me? I didn't
think I'd have a chance to talk to you today, so
I've gotta admit, I'm really happy you're here.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Come on, rise and
shine, sleepy-face! You look dead to the world
right now...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You were calling
my name in your sleep, you know! What kind of
dream were you having...?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
When you're sleeping, you look so...defenseless.
Seeing you like that makes me feel more relaxed
myself, for some reason.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, did you even hear me when I
greeted you this morning? ...You were still half-
asleep at the time, weren't you?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, do you think you'll be home at a
reasonable time today? ...No real reason, I just
think it'd be nice to eat with you for a change.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You seem awfully busy. As usual, I suppose! If
there's anything I can help you with, though,
you just let me know, all right?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Doesn't it strike you as...deeply wrong that we
haven't said a word to one another until this late
in the day? Or is it just me?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good work today. You should get to bed early.
<PAGE>
<POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I mean it! If you get up late tomorrow, there
won't be any breakfast left.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Huh? You want me to comfort you, 'cause
you're tired? Awwww.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...I'm busy at the moment, but I'll be happy to
do it later, you needy little lamb, you! Hee hee...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is the perfect weather for gardening, and I
can pick all the flowers my bosom can hold!
What's not to like?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
*sigh* Rain, rain, go away; ruin my work
another day...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's much...much...too...hooooooot...
Uuuuuuugh... I need to be careful, or I might
pass out...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Such gloomy, humid weather... I don't want to
go anywhere on a day like this. But if there's
work to do, well...then I guess I have no choice!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's so crisp and beautiful out, isn't it? This...
This is autumn. At its best.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Such terrible weather today! And the wind has
such a tremendous chill to it. If I stay out for too
long, I'm sure to catch cold!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sun does nothing to warm the chill in the
air. Where I'm from, it never snows, so cold
weather and I...do not get along.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I couldn't figure out why I had such a chill in my
bones today, but then I realized it's snowing.
Ugh... I hate the snow. Gives me a headache.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I saw the wind actually blow a bird away earlier.
Be careful you don't get swept up yourself!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What is up with this weather? It's snowing like
crazy! If there were ever a day to stay home and
take it easy, this would be the one.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, you shouldn't be out in this typhoon. Stay
indoors today, please?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...Not that you're likely to listen to me, are you?
You can't stay inside. It's not in your nature. But
at least be careful out there, okay?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey, you shouldn't be out in this weather. You're
going to make me sick with worry, you know
that?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
So, I hear you're seeing someone now! Is
"congratulations" the appropriate thing to say in
this situation? Let's just go with, "best wishes."

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Open or closed, this place smells good. Raeger
must be cooking here every single day, even in
his off hours.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I used to travel all the time, I ate at a lot of
restaurants...but this is among the top five,
without a doubt.
<PAGE>
My compliments to the chef. He mustn't have
any idea just how good he is, running a modest
establishment like this in such a small town.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fritz always worries about being wasteful, saying
he can't bring himself to throw things away...but
that just leads to a messy house!
<PAGE>
Sometimes, you have to cut damaged branches
from your favorite tree in order to keep the root
from rotting, you know?
<PAGE>
I keep telling him that if he continues to live
such a cluttered life, it'll catch up to him in the
end...but does he listen to me? Noooooo...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I only just realized that Fritz is...actually still
doing farm work these days, isn't he?
<PAGE>
I just assumed he was slacking off. Though...I
guess he kind of is, or else he'd produce enough
yield to get noticed.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I really enjoy working in this garden. I feel lucky
to have gotten such a lovely job.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fishing isn't easy, is it? I was hoping for a fish
dinner tonight, but I...guess I'll settle for
something else instead!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Plants and trees everywhere... I guess that's
what being in the middle of a mountain will get
you!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There was some kind of animal in the bush over
there, but it ran before I had a chance to see
what it was. I wonder what it could've been...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I come here to fish sometimes, but I never seem
to catch much. Is it just 'cause there's not much
to catch, or am I just...bad at fishing?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
When the weather gets warm, my favorite thing
to do is head on over into the shade and take a
nap.
<PAGE>
Huh? What about on cold days? ...No idea. You
probably shouldn't be taking naps outside on
cold days in the first place.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I bet I could make a nice garden here.
<PAGE>
...But this is more your domain, being a farm
and all.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Farming and gardening aren't too far apart from
one another. Just like in gardening, you can tell
a lot about farmers by studying their farms.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The other day, Fritz tried to jump down from
that ledge, but it...didn't end well.
<PAGE>
What was he even thinking?! There's a paved
street below!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Some of the farmland the guild rents out seems
pretty nice. I expect some good stuff to grow
there!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear that farm used to belong to a nice old
lady.
<PAGE>
It must've been hard for her to get all the farm
work done, but I hear she did a fine job with it,
every day.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This shallow slope is perfect for exercising.
Power-walkers of the world, unite!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can tell who's working that field just by the
way the field looks.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
So...Fritz is raising crops here, right? That
seems somehow kind of...ominous. Will he be
all right? Will THEY be all right to consume...?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Doesn't it seem like there might be
something...over there? Across the river? Guess
the only way to find out, though, is to swim...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So who's in charge of that field again?
<PAGE>
And are they growing those crops out of
personal taste...
<PAGE>
...or just because of market demand?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm surprised by Elise's paddies. The crops here
are very well cared for! She may have a few
good points to her yet...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I appreciate the simple layout of this town. The
place I lived before was a bit more...labyrinthine.
And I don't care for mazes.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Every time I look at someone's garden, I get this
overwhelming urge to do some trimming. I think
I've been working as a gardener for far too long!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...I don't have anything particularly interesting to
say. If there's nothing you need, why are you
speaking with me?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do I enjoy most in the world? I guess that
would be reading books and studying different
cultures and histories. But why do you ask?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't tend to stick around in one town for very
long, thanks to my chosen profession.
<PAGE>
But now that I've been asked to tend the garden
at this enormous mansion on a more-or-less
permanent basis...
<PAGE>
I'm thinking perhaps it's time to settle down.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What is his deal?! Every single day, if he sees
me, he talks to me all politely, like I'm just part
of his daily routine.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...Fritz, I mean. I keep telling him not to talk to
me, but he does it anyway! It's getting really
annoying.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You probably shouldn't talk to me. I'm a rather
blunt and harsh person, so I'm sure to say
something offensive -- if I haven't already!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>And you...seem to be a really nice person, so I
don't want to bring you down.
<PAGE>
So you should go. Shoo! ...You aren't listening.
You're still talking to me! Why am I getting deja
vu here...?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...All right, you win! Talk to me all you want. I'll
try -- I'll TRY not to say anything offensive to
you from here on out, okay?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What made me want to be a gardener? Well,
that's none of your business, now, is it?!
<PAGE>
...Okay, okay! I'll tell you! Just don't give me that
pleading look.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I just...enjoy it! That's all, really. I'm sorry I don't
have a better explanation than that.
<PAGE>
...That's why I was dodging the question...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You are a stubborn one, you know that? I guess
thanks to that, though, we've been able to get to
know one another a little better.
<PAGE>
I don't know what you think of me, but I
consider you to be...my best friend, I guess.
<PAGE>
So I'm counting on you to be best friend-y from
now on, <MYNAME>, you hear?!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...Do you need something? I don't really feel like
talking to you right now.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It feels like your attitude toward me has changed
over time.
<PAGE>
If I did something wrong, please just tell me. If
you don't, I can't very well make up for it, you
know?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm not used to dating. But...I'm glad to be your
boyfriend, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Everyone's having so much fun watching how
we talk to one another...or, I guess, specifically
how I talk to you.
<PAGE>
Ugh, it's so aggravating! Why do they have to
grin so much?!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know what people say about me?
<PAGE>
They say I'm bad at expressing myself, so I
come across sounding all grumpy...
<PAGE>
...But you've been telling them I'm not really like
that where it counts.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Always coming to my defense, aren't you?
...Thanks, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I don't think I've ever gotten along so well with
everyone before!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What? What do I like about you...? Why are you
asking that all of a sudden?!
<PAGE>
I...don't know. I like you because I like you. I
don't have to say what I like about you! I like
everything about you! Geez!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Before I started dating you, I thought I didn't
need all that love and relationship nonsense...but
it turns out it was the best thing for me.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R><FACE_LOVE>Without you, I'm nothing. You are my
everything. I love you with all of my heart,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You changed after we got married. You always
used to be like... No. No, never mind. I'm
wasting my breath explaining this to you.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...Is this what all married lives are like?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I feel like you've been acting particularly distant
lately.
<PAGE>
If you have complaints about me, just say so.
No secrets! That's how couples should be,
right?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I've been traveling alone for a very long time, so
it's nice to have someone waiting for me when I
get home. It does feel a little...funny, though...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not good with housework, but if there's
anything I can help you with, please just let me
know. I'll do anything I can.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I hear people say that I've became soft after
getting married. Well, of course I have!
<PAGE>
Constant happiness will do that to a person.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R><MYNAME>, I love you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...What? Can't a man tell his love how he feels
from time to time?
<PAGE>
...Oh, you want me to say that every day? Pfft.
Don't push your luck!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...Don't laugh at me, please. I can't help it if I'm
nervous. I've never dated anyone before.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...You should find yourself a better man next
time. Not some loser like me. ...Best of luck in
the hunt...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
*sigh* I never thought I'd date someone in the
first place, much less date someone I'd broken
up with before.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Well, I'm looking forward to dating you again, I
guess!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME> and I, sitting in a tree, M-A-R-R-I-E-
D, huh? Feels pretty surreal...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I thought I was prepared for your warm body in
the bed next to mine, but I don't think I can ever
truly get used to you sleeping next to me.
<PAGE>
I actually fell out of bed this morning...again.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
So we're going to be parents now, huh? It just
doesn't seem real to me. I'm going to be a
father! I need to get ready...to see our baby.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you come up with a name for our bouncing
baby? ...Don't tell me I'm the only one thinking
about that...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm so nervous. Our baby could be born any day
now! Dunno how I'm gonna make it, but I've
gotta!
<PAGE>
That's the joy and the burden of fatherhood!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Our children are so cute, aren't they? Look, even
their nails are so teeny-tiny eensy-weensy cutie-
patootie...
<PAGE>
...Why are you laughing?! This is a natural
reaction for a father to have! Purely, completely
natural!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look at our children go! Crawling after me like
little hunters...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>This old heart of mine can't take the cuteness.
It's cuteness overload! AAAAAAHHH!!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Every time we celebrate our children's birthday, I
find myself thanking the powers that be that
they've grown up to be such healthy li'l tykes...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This color... Well now, look what we have here!
I don't much care for vegetables, but this one's
delicious. Thanks!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Did you go to all this trouble, just for
little old me?! You're so kind! Thank you...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Can I really have this? Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? ...Thanks.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ugh... Uh, I mean, yay! I'll...I'll take it! Since it's
a gift and all. Rude to turn down a gift.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh...no... Nonono, please, take it away! ...What
do you mean NO?! Only I can say "no" here!
NOOOOOOOOO!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>...Are you saying I need to eat more vegetables?
...You're so cruel, <MYNAME>...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is this sparkly thing? ...What's that? I can
have it? For real?! Wow, thanks!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? Wow, it's golden...and
shimmering! It's so rare-looking, and beautiful...
Thank you!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't even want to touch that...but rare items
like this are hard to come by, so I can't exactly
say no. I guess...I'll take it!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Shimmering or no, this is something I despise. I
am NOT taking it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...Why are you being so stubborn?! Fine, I'll take
it! But just this once. Never again!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)
Let's not give him a present right now.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present? ...I don't need it. Why don't you give
it to someone else?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...We haven't seen one another in forever, and
you try to make it up to me with a gift? I don't
need your pity.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Are you aware how many days it's been since
we last talked? Don't even try bribing me. Just
put it away, and go.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've given me way too much as it is. Let's call
it a day on the gift-giving, shall we?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You already gave me a present today, and I don't
have room for much more. You'd better hang
onto it.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You've already given me a present today. I really
shouldn't accept any more. But thank you for
thinking of me!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh! I didn't expect to receive something so nice
for my birthday. I'm a lucky guy!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This...is my favorite...
What? It's a birthday present for me?!
<PAGE>
So you picked it out just for me?! ...Wow, thank
you so much!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, I like this quite a bit. It's a present for my
birthday, you say? Well, thank you!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? A birthday present? For me?! Wow.
Thanks!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
For my birthday, I receive...something I really
don't like. *sigh* Well, it's the thought that
counts!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You trying to harass me with this or
something?! Come on, now!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_ANGER_R>If you're going to give me something for my
birthday, why would you settle on something I
openly revile?
<PAGE>
Are you trying to make me suffer?!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I didn't expect to receive something so sparkly
for my birthday. You're so kind! Thank you!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's with the sparkle sparkle? ...Huh? It's a
birthday present for me?! Oh. Wow. Thanks!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Well, today is my birthday, and I have to admit, I
don't generally see shiny things like this out in
the wild. But...I don't really like these!
<PAGE>
...I assume you didn't know. Which is fine. I'll
take it, and I greatly appreciate the thought. But
try to remember for next time, please, okay?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
So not only do you give me something I don't
like, but you give me a SHINY, SPARKLY version
of something I don't like?
<PAGE>
Are you trying to rub it in my face or
something?!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's...a rabbit...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...N-not that I think it's cute or want to touch it
or anything! Geez!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Look at its puffy tail! Hee hee hee!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
So, you're our local ermine who always wanders
these grounds, are you? ...You look good,
buddy. You look good.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, it's a sifaka, huh? That's a good little
buddy! ...Ah, I don't have anything to give you
right now. But next time! Next time, for sure!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Man... That is cute... What a cute little penguin!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ha ha, who's got a cute little monkey face?
YOU'VE got a cute little monkey face!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What? You were caught by <MYNAME>? Not
much of a fighter, little parrot! ...<MYNAME>,
you'd better release it later on, okay?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you trying to keep an exotic pet or
something? I guess it can't hurt for now, but
make sure you release it back into the wild later.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When Angora rabbits look at you with those big,
round eyes, doesn't it make you feel bad for
taking their fur?
<PAGE>
...Not that they actually seem sad. Maybe they're
glad someone else gets some use out of their
old hair! So I'm just talking nonsense here...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You know what I like? Looking at chicks.
...No, no, the baby chickens! Geez...
